attributes.action: Scrap the Human Rights Act and Integrate the Police and the Prison Service into the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To often our press is plagued with stories of street gangs running riot while innocent people suffer at their hands. We propose the scrapping of the Human Rights Act so offenders can be punished properly while the Police are integrated into the Armed Forces, armed and trained to deal properly with offenders. The police and the prison service can then deal properly with offenders while protecting the public properly.
